textBeforeTable: Points of Distance Directions Whirlpool Wheelchair access Wake-up service Visa Steam room Spa - partial services Smoking area(s) Sauna Room service Roll-in shower access Restaurant Recycle Pet friendly Outdoor pool Net rates/commissionable Meeting rooms MC Lounge Licensed dining - Corkage Fee Licensed dining Laundry Internet - Wireless - Rooms Internet - Wireless - Meeting Facilities Internet - High Speed - Rooms Internet - High Speed - Meeting Facilities In-room movies Hot tub - Indoor HDTV Group tour rates Group tour policy Free parking Fitness area Family friendly Entertainment Elevators Eco-friendly Disability accessible rooms Debit Card/Interac Cable TV AMEX Air conditioning 4 Green Key Eco-Rating 100% Non-smoking Amenities TV Remote Control TV Toilet Temperature Control Smoke Detectors Shower Ironing Board Iron Hairdryer In Room Free Newspaper Cordless Telephone Coffeemaker Cable TV Alarm Clock King Bed Sitting Area Turndown Service Refrigerator Wi-Fi Luxury elements of this room include nightly turn down service, luxury spa robes, slippers, pillow program, Keurig coffee machine with selection of coffees, BOGNAR bathroom amenities, grab and go breakfast, complimentary Globe & Mail newspaper.  This 280 sq. ft. room features 1 king bed, 47 inch wall mounted flat screen HDTV, premium cable and in-room movies, spacious work area, glass enclosed rain shower, Hydra Spa bathroom amenities, in-room mini fridge, 17-inch safe, iPod/iPad docking station, complimentary high speed and wireless internet access, complimentary local and 1-800 calls.
textAfterTable: Arriving from West of Calgary Enter Calgary on PROVINCIAL ROUTE 1 E / 16 AVE W / TRANSCANADA HWY ETake the SARCEE TRAIL ramp toward HWY 2 STurn SLIGHT RIGHT onto SARCEE TRAIL SWStay STRAIGHT to go onto GLENMORE TRAIL SWTake the BLACKFOOT TRAIL rampTake the BLACKFOOT TRAIL NORTH rampMerge onto BLACKFOOT TRAIL SETurn RIGHT onto 58 AVENUEImmediately turn RIGHT into the Hotel Blackfoot parking lot Arriving from South of Calgary Enter Calgary on HWY 2 (DEERFOOT TRAIL) At EXIT 248 keep RIGHT onto ramp towards GLENMORE TRAIL EAST / GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake ramp RIGHT onto GLENMORE TRAIL SE towards GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake Ramp RIGHT onto BLACKFOOT TRAIL SE towards BLACKFOOT TRAIL NORTHTurn RIGHT onto 58 AVENUEImmediately turn RIGHT into the Hotel Blackfoot parking lot. Arriving from North of Calgary Enter Calgary on HWY 2 South bound - DEERFOOT TRAILAt EXIT 248, keep RIGHT onto ramp towards GLENMORE TRAIL EAST / GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake ramp (RIGHT) onto GLENMORE TRAIL SE towards GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake ramp (RIGHT) onto BLACKFOOT TRAIL SE towards BLACKFOOT TRAIL NORTHTurn RIGHT onto 58 AVENUEImmediately turn RIGHT into the Hotel Blackfoot parking lot. Arriving from East of Calgary Enter Calgary on TRANS CANADA HWY (16 AVENUE N)Take the DEERFOOT TRAIL SOUTH exit  (on LEFT)At EXIT 248, keep RIGHT onto ramp towards GLENMORE TRAIL EAST / GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake ramp RIGHT onto GLENMORE TRAIL SE towards GLENMORE TRAIL WESTTake ramp RIGHT onto BLACKFOOT TRAIL towards BLACKFOOT TRAIL NORTHTurn RIGHT onto 58 AVENUEImmediately turn RIGHT into the Hotel Blackfoot parking lot.
